name: Alien Assault (JordanAndGavenGames)
description:
See how many waves you can survive as you defend against an alien assault. 

Controls: 

  • WASD - Move
  • L - Shoot / Start Game
  • P - Get weapon from crate
  • Crates will spawn when you run out of ammo
  • A medkit will spawn every three rounds

Made as a GBJAM7 entry by Jordan London and Gaven Martung.
